title: Lobbyists linked to Donald Trump paid millions by world’s poorest countries
summary: After Trump terminated most US foreign aid programs, former recipient countries like Somalia and Yemen spent $17 million on lobbying firms linked to the president to secure funds and military support
description: After Trump terminated most US foreign aid programs, former recipient countries like Somalia and Yemen spent $17 million on lobbying firms linked to the president to secure funds and military support
